## IndexedBufferedGeometryAccessor.getCount() method

Returns number of primitives, which is not known in this base class, so we return the number of indices.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
/** @override */
getCount(): number;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

number

The number of indices in the geometry.
